# LLM Index: @nimibyte/intersection-hook

Project: @nimibyte/intersection-hook
Homepage: https://github.com/nimibyte/intersection-hook
Repository: https://github.com/nimibyte/intersection-hook
Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nimibyte/intersection-hook
License: MIT

Primary intent: React scrollspy utility powered by IntersectionObserver.

Best for:
- Highlighting active menu item based on visible content section
- Building docs/blog table of contents navigation
- In-page smooth scrolling to registered sections

Core API:
- IntersectionProvider
- useIntersection
- register({ id, label })
- activeSection
- sections
- scrollTo(id)

Read first:
- README.md
- README.ai.md

Integration notes:
- Wrap consumers with IntersectionProvider
- Register each section with ref callback from register
- Use sections to render nav links
- Use activeSection for current state styling

Non-goals:
- Router-level active path management
- Framework-agnostic usage outside React
